net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers

Class PermOverrideManagerUpdatable

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.PermOverrideManagerUpdatable

  • public class PermOverrideManagerUpdatable
extends java.lang.Object
    An updatable manager that allows to modify PermissionOverride settings such as the granted and denied Permissions.

    This manager allows to modify multiple fields at once followed by a call of update()!
    Default is no permissions granted/denied.

    The PermOverrideManager implementation simplifies this process by giving simple setters that return the update RestAction

    Note: To update this manager the currently logged in account requires the Permission MANAGE_PERMISSIONS in the parent Channel

      • getAllowBits

        public java.lang.Long getAllowBits()
        The granted Permissions value represented as raw long bits.
        Use Permission.getPermissions(long) to retrieve a list of Permissions from the returned bits.

        This value represents all permissions that should be granted by this PermissionOverride

        Returns:
        Granted Permissions value or null if isSet() is false

      • getDenyBits

        public java.lang.Long getDenyBits()
        The denied Permissions value represented as raw long bits.
        Use Permission.getPermissions(long) to retrieve a list of Permissions from the returned bits.

        This value represents all permissions that should be denied by this PermissionOverride

        Returns:
        Denied Permissions value or null if isSet() is false

      • getInheritBits

        public java.lang.Long getInheritBits()
        The inherited Permissions value represented as raw long bits.
        Use Permission.getPermissions(long) to retrieve a list of Permissions from the returned bits.

        This value represents all permissions that are not granted or denied by the settings of this Manager instance - thus they represent all permissions that are set to inherit from other overrides.

        Returns:
        Inherited Permissions value or null if isSet() is false

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet()
        Whether anything has been modified yet
        Returns:
        Whether anything has been modified

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all Permission values
        This is automatically called by update()

      • update

        public AuditableRestAction<java.lang.Void> update()
        Creates a new RestAction instance that will apply all changes that have been made to this manager instance.
        If no changes have been made this will simply return EmptyRestAction.

        Before applying new changes it is recommended to call reset() to reset previous changes.
        This is automatically called if this method returns successfully.

        Possible ErrorResponses for this update include the following:

        • UNKNOWN_OVERRIDE
          If the PermissionOverride was deleted before finishing the task
        • MISSING_ACCESS
          If the currently logged in account was removed from the Guild before finishing the task
        • MISSING_PERMISSIONS
          If the currently logged in account loses the MANAGE_PERMISSIONS Permission
        Returns:
        AuditableRestAction
        Applies all changes that have been made in a single api-call.
        Throws:
        InsufficientPermissionException - If the currently logged in account does not have the Permission MANAGE_PERMISSIONS in the Channel

        protected boolean shouldUpdate()
